response.overview: In the bustling heart of the city, young Omarâ€™s world unravels when he forgets his laptop bag at the barbershop. What starts as a simple mistake spirals into a heartbreaking crisis; within that bag lie his dreams, memories, and pieces of his childhood. As darkness falls, he races against time, consumed by fear and despair. Overwhelmed, he bangs his hand on his head in anguish, collapsing under the weight of his loss. In this whirlwind of emotions, will he find the strength to reclaim not just his belongings, but a part of himself? A poignant tale of grief and resilience unfolds as Omar faces the depths of his turmoil and the glimmers of hope that remain.
response.tagline: What we leave behind often carries the heaviest weight.
response.title: Everything Unpacked
